title: Binance User Base Grew 30% This Year, Expanding Even After U.S. Legal Settlements
description: The largest cryptocurrency trading venue added 40 million accounts to 170 million.

title: India takes steps to block Binance, Huobi, other global crypto exchange URLs
description:
India's Financial Intelligence Unit is requesting to block the URLs of Binance, Kucoin, Huobi, Kraken, Gate.io, Bittrex, Bitstamp, MEXC Global and Bitfinex.

India's Financial Intelligence Unit had issued compliance notices to nine foreign Virtual Digital Assets Service Providers for allegedly operating illegally and violating Anti-Money Laundering regulations.

Among the crypto service providers are global crypto exchanges Binance, KuCoin, Huobi, Kraken, Gate.io, Bittrex, Bitstamp, MEXC Global and Bitfinex. According to a press release on Dec. 28, the Unit requested the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology to block the companies' URLs, presumably to prevent their websites from being accessed in the country.

"Till date 31 VDA SPs have registered with FIU IND. However, several offshore entities though catering to a substantial part of Indian users were not getting registered and coming under the Anti Money Laundering (AML) and Counter Financing of Terrorism (CFT) framework," reads the document.

title: Coinbase International Exchange caps perpetual futures leverage at 10x
description:
In addition, users are capped at a notional value of $90,000 for all 10x contracts.

Coinbase International Exchange, the overseas arm of the United States-based Coinbase crypto exchange, will cap trading leverage at 10x for its perpetual futures products.

According to the Dec. 28 announcement, the limit applies to the exchange's popular perpetual futures contracts such as Bitcoin (BTC), Cardano (ADA), Ether (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Solana (SOL), XRP, and others. Furthermore, traders using 10x leverage will be limited to maintaining a notional value of $90,000 across all perpetual contracts. 

Related: Coinbase could serve as TradFi’s ‘index play on crypto’ — Analyst

title: The Unfounded Panic Over AI: A Tale of Elite Delusion
description: In the year 2023, a peculiar trend has gripped political elites on both sides of the Atlantic: an unfounded fear of a fictional god-like artificial intelligence, or artificial general intelligence (AGI). This baseless panic has manifested in policy summits, new regulations, and apocalyptic warnings about a technology that is yet to exist. The absurdity of […]
